column5: Lead, collaborate, inspire and be inspired. Master the challenges of management, innovation and strategy in global organizations through in-depth courses, live projects and on an exchange term at another top university. Upon acceptance to the MSc Program in International Business candidates are pre-approved to begin the CEMS Master in International Management in their second year and therefore eligible for a double degree.
column7: MSc programs: SEK 180 000 / year Citizens of an EU/EEA country or Switzerland are not required to pay tuition fees.
